channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 22:49 Alarm repulse in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 22:49 Alarm repulse in Kharkiv Oblast. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky District- Lipetsk Territorial Community- Vovchan Territorial Community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
